DOC.brief_summary: This study aim clarify asthma medication use practice asthma affect everyday life . Total 106 GPs ask recruit patient use inhaled steroid maintenance treatment asthma take part telephone survey . Altogether 142 patient interview .
DOC.brief_title: Asthma Patient Survey Study Assess Asthma Effect Medication Finland
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed persistent asthma regular use inhale steroid concomitant medication never diagnose COPD seasonal asthma
